TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 Web 服务器控件的设计时行为。

span.span: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 节包含两个代码示例。The section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何从类派生类。The first code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class. 第二个代码示例演示如何在设计`StyledTable`时显示类。The second code example demonstrates how to display the `StyledTable` class at design time. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名`StyledTableDesigner`为的设计器类, 该类派生自类, 用于在设计时为从类派生的类显示两个单元格。The following code example demonstrates how to create a designer class named `StyledTableDesigner`, which is derived from the class, and is used to display two cells at design time for a class that is derived from the class. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtabledesigner.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用`DesignerAttribute`将`StyledTableDesigner`类与`StyledTable`类相关联, 以便在设计时可以显示。The following code example uses the `DesignerAttribute` to associate the `StyledTableDesigner` class with the `StyledTable` class so that it can be displayed at design time. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtable.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: 用于在设计时表示控件的 HTML。

span.span: The HTML used to represent the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确保表至少具有一个行和单元格, 并且单元格包含在设计时显示的某些文本。The method ensures that the table has at least one row and cell and that the cells contain some text for display at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以在设计图面上显示`StyledTable`类的行和单元格。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to display rows and cells for the `StyledTable` class on the design surface. `Try`在块中, 代码检查该表是否包含任何行或单元格, 如果不存在, 则创建一个行并执行一个循环, 以便为该行创建两个单元格, 以及在设计时在每个单元格中显示的占位符文本。In the `Try` block, the code checks whether the table contains any rows or cells, and if it does not, creates a row and performs a loop to create two cells for the row, along with placeholder text to display in each cell at design time. 如果该表不为空, 但行为, 则代码将执行相同的循环来创建和填充单元格。If the table is not empty, but a row is, the code performs the same loop to create and populate the cells. `Finally`在块中, 代码将值返回到其原始状态。In the `Finally` block, the code returns the values to their original state. [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TableDesigner/VB/customtabledesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetPersistInnerHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPersistInnerHtml () As String

returns.span: 控件的持久性内部 HTML 标记。

span.span: The persistable inner HTML markup of the control.
